title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
Hello, we have a product for warm your place. It is called KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat. This heater can make warm fast in just 2 seconds because it has PTC heating element, this is good for make heat quick. You can choose two power for heat: one is 750W and other is more strong with 1500W. Also, if you just want to move air, it has Fan mode.

Safety is very important, so our heater will stop if it gets too hot or if it falls over more than 45 degrees. This is good for not have accidents. It is not heavy, only 2.6 pounds, and size is small like 7.72 inches wide, 6.38 inches deep, and 9.13 inches tall. You can put it in many places like home, dorm, office, or kitchen because it is black and looks nice.

The heater is for use inside and uses electric to run. It is quiet because noise is below 45 dB. This is not loud, so it will not bother you. We have ETL certification, this means it is safe and good quality. Please think about buying this heater if you need to stay warm in a room up to 200 square feet. Thank you.

Hello, we have a product for make warm in spaces like home, place for work, dorm, and kitchen. This product name is KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat. It is black color and for use inside.

This heater has two power options for heat. When you need little warm, it use 750W, and when you need more warm, it use 1500W. Also, it can just move air with Fan mode without heat. This is good for not too cold time.

Heater is safe because it stop if get too hot inside or if fall down over 45 degrees angle. This is good for worry less about danger. It is not big, size is 7.72 inches wide, 6.38 inches deep, and 9.13 inches tall. Not heavy, just 2.6 pounds.

It has ETL certification, so is made with good standards. Heater use electricity and have PTC for make heat, which is good type for make warm fast in just 2 seconds. It is also quiet, make noise below 45 dB.

Thank you for look at our heater. If need warm in your place fast and safe, consider this KISSAIR heater for buy.
